title: Election Countdown, Ghost Dads 11.2.20

description:
In episode 748, Jack and Miles are joined by Popcorn Book Club co-host Korama Danquah to discuss celebrity endorsements for Trump, the election, Tucker Carlson deciding it's time to leave Hunter Biden alone, Donald Trump Jr. doing his thing, Kim Kardashian's birthday gift, and more!

  6. WATCH: Hudson Mohawke & S-Type - The Rain
